jute 0.1.1
  • Reference

jute

The jute R package provides a collection of sundry utility functions.

Installation

You can install the development version of jute from github with:

# install.packages("devtools")   # [if not already installed]
devtools::install_github("toniprice/jute")

Last updated: Sun 16 Aug 2020 17:22:36 BST
